title: Downward Facing Dog
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Release your knees to the floor with an exhale and sit back on your heels. Bring feet hip-width apart Bring hands shoulder-width apart Spread fingers and push thumbs and index fingers into floor Draw shoulders away from ears Align ears between arms Reach tailbone up and back Release heels toward floor Avoid this pose if you have high blood pressure or carpal tunnel syndrome.
